document_data.name: Kung Pu Mok
document_data.mainbody: '''Kung Pu Mok''' was the High Priest of [[Shou Lung]] in [[1357 DR]] and [[1358 DR]]
document_data.Activities: Kung Pu Mok plotted to replace the Emperor with a theocracy. He also sought to marry [[Kai Tsao Shou Chin]]'s third daughter, Princess [[Pai]]. In order to fulfill his dream, he forged ties with [[The Way|Black Chung Tao]]. He had an uneasy truce with Minister of Faith [[Yui Min Li]].
document_data.History: In 1358 DR, Kung Pu Mok was busy with a tour of the [[monasteries]] in [[Wa K'an]].
document_data.Personality: Kung Pu Mok was a vain and stubborn individual.
